casebody.data:
In the Matter of A.P. No. 534A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2007. Theresa A. Boucher, Assistant County Attorney, for Forsyth DSS. Robert Newman, Asheboro, for Father-Parks. Gary C. Rhodes, Salisbury, for Hylton. Randi Weiss, Winston-Salem, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of January 2007 by Respondent for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (Mother-Parks) shall have up to and including the 28th day of February 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of January 2007."
